name: Endless Saw Survive
description:
Controls

Left Area: WASD or Arrow Keys to move the frog.

Middle Area: Spacebar to make the bird fly.     

Right Area: Drag and Drop the carrot to move the rabbit.

Avoid getting hit by any saw and see how long you can keep all three characters alive!

Art

Artist: Pixel Frog - https://pixelfrog-store.itch.io/

Music

Song: In Action

Artist: veezyn
